name: Kot Bayun
description: The Kot Bayun is a medium-sized monstrosity that embodies a blend of cunning and charm, featuring dexterous abilities and striking charisma.
memorable: Its ability to turn invisible and sing a slumbering song makes it a formidable and deceitful opponent.
goals: Typically aims to incapacitate foes and control the battlefield while providing support to allies.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other stealthy or cunning creatures and may serve as a protector or guardian of magical realms.
environment: Often found in enchanted forests or mystical locations where it can easily employ stealth and charm.
strengths: Strong in Charisma and Dexterity, allowing for effective social manipulation and stealth operations.
weaknesses: Somewhat average Constitution may limit its resilience in prolonged combat.
attacks: Uses a combination of a powerful slumbering song to incapacitate, followed by a bite and claw attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Slumbering Song can incapacitate a target, providing the Kot Bayun strategic advantages in combat.
senses: Possesses darkvision which aids in stealth, though its passive perception is rather average.
skills: Has proficiency in Stealth, making it adept at evading detection.
additional_information: Can use Healing Purr to restore health and cure ailments.
Relies on strategic use of invisibility to ambush enemies or escape.
Gains advantages in charisma-based interactions due to high Charisma score.
Can incapacitate foes for up to a minute with its Slumbering Song.
Uses stealth and charm to manipulate situations to its advantage.

monstrosity that can turn invisible and sing
cunning creature that puts enemies to sleep
healer that can sing and attack
